description: These versatile boots will take you from the park to backcountry booters, with a smooth, progressive flex and custom-lacing system that lets you customize the fit of the upper and lower portions. Modern styling,  comfortable chassis and washable liners ensure that you'll be looking, feeling and smelling good.Versatile medium flex for all-conditions riding.External heel cage creates a smooth, progressive flex.Thermomoldable liner provides a custom fit, and is machine washable.Cat-Tongue material at base of heel grips your socks for increased heel hold.Zonal quick-pull lacing system allows independent adjustment of upper and lower portions of the boot.Ortholite footbed wicks moisture for a drier, more comfortable fit.Cushioning EVA midsole.Grippy rubber outsole is low profile for comfortable riding and walking.
name: Salomon Dialogue Snowboard Boots - Men's
